entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 2:12 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:12 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:12 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
